explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a man wearing a turban sits at a wooden table with a plate of chocolate donuts in front of him. He holds a knife in his right hand, smiles, and looks at the donuts. In the background, some decorations and furniture are visible, including several black and white photos or artworks on the wall. There is also a TV or monitor in the room. A white caption with black text appears in the middle of the screen: "Sibling: 'give me half'".

[0-2] First, the man in the turban cuts into a donut with the knife in his right hand. The scene changes, the middle caption disappears, and a white caption with black text appears at the top: "The half:". Below, a left hand holds a chocolate donut, and a knife cuts through the middle of the donut.

[2-5] Then the scene changes. On a wooden table, there is a plate with two chocolate donuts and two plain donuts. A left hand on the left side and a right hand on the right side pick up the two chocolate donuts and put them together, then pick up the two plain donuts and put them together. The scene changes, the captions disappear, and a person wearing a pink fist mask sits at a wooden table with a plate of plain donuts in his left hand and a plate of chocolate donuts in his right hand. He holds out the plate of plain donuts.

[5-7] Finally, the scene changes to a man in a black short-sleeved shirt. He holds the plate of plain donuts in his right hand, opens his mouth and smiles at the front, then turns his head to the left and opens his mouth wide. A white caption with black text appears in the middle: "Mooom". The caption disappears. A hand on the right swipes at the man's face. The man in the black shirt falls onto a sofa, facing right, holding a mobile phone in his left hand and the plate in his right hand.
